Event Timeline

Inaugural Session

This is our inauguration event of the chapter! In this event, we got together, discussed the goals of our chapter, and had some fun! This was a Networking Event.

Front-end Marathon

Codecademy Chapters came together to give the ultimate beginner's guide to front end development. A week-long event covering Internet Basics, HTML, CSS, Javascript and React.

JavaScript Roadmap I

Join me to learn JavaScript: the language of the web We will be learning diving into the language and learning more about the scope of JavaScript in the industry You will be learning more about the language, its crazy history of evolution, and its applications in the real-world Once you are inspired enough, we will get our hands dirty through a code-along session and start building dynamic webpages

JU Chapter Meetup - 1

Just a quick meet up to connect, share and discuss more on our learning journey, future events and so on ...

JavaScript Roadmap II

JavaScript Roadmap II - DOM Manipulation Join me to learn JavaScript: the language of the web. We will be diving deep into the language and learn more about DOM Manipulation in JavaScript. You will be learning more about the language, its importance, dynamic rendering, and write practical scripts. Once you are inspired enough, we will get our hands dirty through a code-along session and start building dynamic webpages.

Git & GitHub

Master Git & GitHub through a set of practical tutorials. You will be learning more about what is Git & GitHub and why are we using them? We will also explore more about how Git stores information. And get our hands dirty through a code-along session using Git in command-line.

JavaScript Roadmap III

Join me to learn JavaScript: the language of the web. We will be diving deep into the language and learn more about EcmaScript. You will be learning more about the language standards, their importance, and the best practices. Once you are inspired enough, we will get our hands dirty through a code-along session and start building dynamic webpages.
